#Text= Why , Koku ! " exclaimed the young inventor , as he leaned out of the window , and extended his hand to the moving picture man to help him out of the drift .

column1: #Text=" What do you mean by that ?

column3:
_	_	_	_

#Text= No , but no one shall lay hands on my master ! " declared the giant half savagely .

column1: #Text=" I have vowed to always protect you from danger , in return for what you did for me .
#Text=" Yes , you overturned me all right , " admitted Mr. Period , as he got to his feet , and crawled in through the window to the shop again .
#Text=" I went head over heels .

column3:
_	_	_	_

#Text= I guess he thought you were going to harm me , " said Tom in a low voice , as the picture man came in the shop .

column1: #Text=" Koku is very devoted to me , and sometimes he makes trouble , " the youth went on . "

column3:
_	_	_	_

#Text=But he means it all for the best .

#Text= I shall not , " said the giant calmly , for Tom had taught him to speak fairly good English , though sometimes he got his words backwards .

column1: #Text=" The man was about to kill you , and I stopped him -- I will stop him once more , though if he does not like the snow , I can throw him somewhere else . "
#Text=" No !

column3:
_	_	_	_

#Text= I am glad to hear you say that , " exclaimed the picture man .

column1: #Text=" I have hopes that you will do what I want . "
#Text=" He your friend ? " asked Koku wonderingly .
#Text=" Certainly ; and you must beg his pardon for what you did , " insisted Tom .
#Text=" Very well .

_	_	_	_

#Text=I am glad you did not hurt yourself ,  said the giant , and with that " apology " he stalked out of the room , his feelings evidently very much disturbed .

column1: #Text=" I guess he ca n't see any one but you , Tom .

column3:
_	_	_	_

#Text= No , the snow did n't seem to do that any harm , " replied the young inventor , as he looked at the brilliant piece of red silk around Mr. Period 's collar .

column1: #Text=" I am very particular about my neckties , " went on the picture man .
#Text=" I always wear one color .
#Text="

column3:
_	_	_	_

#Text=He looked appealingly at Tom , and , remembering the rather rude and unexpected treatment to which Koku had submitted the gentleman , Tom felt his mind changing .

#Text= Will you go ? " asked Mr. Period , picking up his fountain pen and check book , that he had laid aside when he walked over to Tom , just before the giant grasped him .

column1: #Text=" Say you will . "
#Text=The young inventor was silent a moment .
#Text=He thought over the many adventures he had gone through -- in the caves of ice , in the city of gold , escaping from the giants , and the red pygmies --
#Text=He went over the details of his trips through the air , of the dangers under the seas , of those he had escaped from on Earthquake Island .
#Text=Surely he was entitled to a little rest at home .
